name: Getaway
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vue@2.6.14/dist/vue.js https://maps.googleapis.com https://kit.fontawesome.com https://unpkg.com https://cdn.plot.ly/plotly-2.9.0.min.js https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/axios/dist/axios.min.js; object-src 'self'
